entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
